thread.title: It's guns vs dildos at US varsity
thread.title_full: It's guns vs dildos at US varsity | News24

author: news24.com
title: It's guns vs dildos at US varsity
text:
Austin - "Campus Dildo Carry" day is on track at the University of Texas and students who pack sex toys to protest a new law that expands the right to carry guns on campus will not be punished, university officials said on Tuesday.
The protest planned for the start of classes next year is aimed at showing what organisers said is the folly of penalising people up to $500 under Texas law for violating obscenity rules for having a sex toy on campus while making it legal for a concealed handgun licence holder to bring a pistol into the classroom.
Nearly 8 000 people have signed up to strap sex toys to their backpacks on August 24 2016, at the university's flagship campus in Austin on the first day of the autumn semester.
On August 1 a new, so-called "campus carry" law will go into effect allowing people 21 and older with a concealed handgun licence to carry handguns in classrooms and buildings at the University of Texas system, one of the nation's largest with an enrolment of more than 214 000.
